name: Evac Havoc 2: Floating Boogaloo
description:
Johnny Harper, evacuation expert and certified badass, has faced every kind of natural disaster.  Now he has to face his greatest challenge yet -- a supernatural disaster!  Rescue people from collapsing floating islands before the Rapture carries them away.

This was made for the Godot Wild Jam #15 with the theme "Floating Islands".

https://github.com/Inglo-Games/EvacHavoc2
